com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment

Class DynamicTutorialFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.tutorial.fragment.DynamicTutorialFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicTutorial<DynamicSimpleTutorial,DynamicTutorialFragment>

    public class DynamicTutorialFragment
extends Fragment
implements DynamicTutorial<DynamicSimpleTutorial,DynamicTutorialFragment>
    A DynamicTutorialFragment with an image, title, subtitle and description that will be used with the DynamicTutorialActivity.

      • onBackgroundColorChanged

        public void onBackgroundColorChanged(int color)
        Description copied from interface: DynamicTutorial
        This method will be called when there is a change in the background color of the activity.

        Implement this method to update any views during the transition.

        Specified by:
        onBackgroundColorChanged in interface DynamicTutorial<DynamicSimpleTutorial,DynamicTutorialFragment>
        Parameters:
        color - The color of the background.
